mapper.insert: INSERT INTO research (rno, rtitle, rdate1, rdate2, rstate, rop, rgdate) VALUES (#{rno}, #{rtitle}, #{rdate1}, #{rdate2}, #{rstate}, #{rop}, NOW())

INSERT INTO researchq(rno, qcont, qtype, qty) VALUES
(#{item.rno}, #{item.qcont}, #{item.qtype}, #{item.qty})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM researchr rr JOIN researchq rq ON rr.qno = rq.qno WHERE rq.rno = #{rno} AND uid = #{uid};
SELECT rno, rtitle, rdate1, rdate2, rstate, rop, rgdate FROM research ORDER BY rgdate desc
SELECT rq.rno, rq.qcont, rq.qtype, rc.cno, rc.qno, rc.choice, rq.qty FROM researchq rq JOIN researchc rc ON rq.qno = rc.qno WHERE rq.rno = #{rno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO researchr(qno, uid, reply, rpdate) VALUES(#{qno}, #{uid}, #{reply}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rr.uid) FROM researchr rr JOIN researchq rq ON rr.qno = rq.qno WHERE rq.rno = #{rno}

SELECT rq.qcont, rq.qno, rc.cno, rc.choice, rq.qty, COUNT(rr.reply) AS reply FROM researchq rq JOIN researchc rc ON rq.qno = rc.qno LEFT JOIN researchr rr ON rq.qno = rr.qno AND rc.cno = rr.reply WHERE rq.rno = #{rno} GROUP BY rq.qno, rc.cno
